mapper.insert: /* insertMngrBoardconfigProc */ INSERT INTO t_board_config( bc_id, bc_name, bc_skin, bc_type, bc_topinfo, bc_viewcount, bc_list, bc_view, bc_regist, bc_update, bc_reply, bc_mngr_list, bc_mngr_view, bc_mngr_regist, bc_mngr_update, bc_mngr_reply, bc_replyyn, bc_fileyn, bc_secretyn, bc_noticeyn, bc_groupyn, bc_groupcode, bc_filecount, bc_filesize, bc_defaultpage, regdt, regmemid, delyn, bc_editoryn, bc_prevnextyn, bc_koglyn, bc_thumbyn, bc_thumbcount, bc_thumbwidth, bc_thumbheight, bc_thumbratioyn, bc_extcolumninfo, bc_filetypedesc, bc_RSS, bc_comment )VALUES( #{bcId}, #{bcName}, #{bcSkin}, #{bcType}, #{bcTopinfo}, #{bcViewcount}, #{bcList}, #{bcView}, #{bcRegist}, #{bcUpdate}, #{bcReply}, #{bcMngrList}, #{bcMngrView}, #{bcMngrRegist}, #{bcMngrUpdate}, #{bcMngrReply}, #{bcReplyyn}, #{bcFileyn}, #{bcSecretyn}, #{bcNoticeyn}, #{bcGroupyn}, concat('_', #{bcId}), #{bcFilecount}, #{bcFilesize}, #{bcDefaultpage}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{regmemid}, 'N', #{bcEditoryn}, #{bcPrevnextyn}, #{bcKoglyn}, #{bcThumbyn}, #{bcThumbcount}, #{bcThumbwidth}, #{bcThumbheight}, #{bcThumbratioyn}, #{bcExtcolumninfo}, #{bcFiletypedesc}, #{bcRSS}, #{bcComment} )
mapper.select: /* selectMngrBoardconfigView */ SELECT a.bc_id, a.bc_name, a.bc_skin, a.bc_type, a.bc_topinfo, a.bc_viewcount, a.bc_list, a.bc_view, a.bc_regist, a.bc_update, a.bc_reply, a.bc_mngr_list, a.bc_mngr_view, a.bc_mngr_regist, a.bc_mngr_update, a.bc_mngr_reply, a.bc_replyyn, a.bc_fileyn, a.bc_secretyn, a.bc_noticeyn, a.bc_groupyn, a.bc_groupcode, a.bc_filecount, a.bc_filesize, a.bc_defaultpage, a.bc_editoryn, a.bc_prevnextyn, a.bc_koglyn, a.bc_thumbyn, a.bc_thumbcount, a.bc_thumbwidth, a.bc_thumbheight, a.bc_thumbratioyn, a.bc_extcolumninfo, CAST(A.REGDT as DATE ) AS REGDT, CAST(A.UPDDT as DATE ) AS UPDDT, CAST(A.DELDT as DATE ) AS DELDT, a.regmemid, a.updmemid, a.delmemid, a.delyn, a.bc_filetypedesc, a.bc_RSS, a.bc_comment, b.group_code, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_board WHERE bc_id = a.bc_id AND delyn = 'N') boardCnt FROM t_board_config a LEFT OUTER JOIN t_manager b ON a.regmemid = b.mng_id WHERE a.delyn = 'N' AND a.bc_id = #{id}
mapper.update: /* updateMngrBoardconfigProc */ UPDATE t_board_config SET bc_name = #{bcName}, bc_skin = #{bcSkin}, bc_type = #{bcType}, bc_topinfo = #{bcTopinfo}, bc_viewcount = #{bcViewcount}, bc_list = #{bcList}, bc_view = #{bcView}, bc_regist = #{bcRegist}, bc_update = #{bcUpdate}, bc_reply = #{bcReply}, bc_mngr_list = #{bcMngrList}, bc_mngr_view = #{bcMngrView}, bc_mngr_regist = #{bcMngrRegist}, bc_mngr_update = #{bcMngrUpdate}, bc_mngr_reply = #{bcMngrReply}, bc_replyyn = #{bcReplyyn}, bc_fileyn = #{bcFileyn}, bc_secretyn = #{bcSecretyn}, bc_noticeyn = #{bcNoticeyn}, bc_groupyn = #{bcGroupyn}, bc_filecount = #{bcFilecount}, bc_filesize = #{bcFilesize}, bc_defaultpage = #{bcDefaultpage}, bc_editoryn = #{bcEditoryn}, bc_prevnextyn = #{bcPrevnextyn}, bc_koglyn = #{bcKoglyn}, bc_thumbyn = #{bcThumbyn}, bc_thumbcount = #{bcThumbcount}, bc_thumbwidth = #{bcThumbwidth}, bc_thumbheight = #{bcThumbheight}, bc_thumbratioyn = #{bcThumbratioyn}, bc_extcolumninfo = #{bcExtcolumninfo}, bc_filetypedesc = #{bcFiletypedesc}, bc_RSS = #{bcRSS}, bc_comment = #{bcComment}, upddt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updmemid = #{updmemid} WHERE delyn = 'N' AND bc_id = #{id}
mapper.select: /* searchAllBoardConfig */ SELECT A.BC_ID, A.BC_NAME, A.BC_SKIN, A.BC_TYPE, A.BC_TOPINFO, A.BC_VIEWCOUNT, A.BC_LIST, A.BC_VIEW, A.BC_REGIST, A.BC_UPDATE, A.BC_REPLY, A.BC_MNGR_LIST, A.BC_MNGR_VIEW, A.BC_MNGR_REGIST, A.BC_MNGR_UPDATE, A.BC_MNGR_REPLY, A.BC_REPLYYN, A.BC_FILEYN, A.BC_SECRETYN, A.BC_NOTICEYN, A.BC_GROUPYN, A.BC_GROUPCODE, A.BC_FILECOUNT, A.BC_FILESIZE, A.BC_DEFAULTPAGE, A.BC_EDITORYN, A.BC_PREVNEXTYN, A.BC_KOGLYN, A.BC_THUMBYN, A.BC_THUMBCOUNT, A.BC_THUMBWIDTH, A.BC_THUMBHEIGHT, A.BC_THUMBRATIOYN, A.BC_EXTCOLUMNINFO, CAST(A.REGDT as DATE ) AS REGDT, CAST(A.UPDDT as DATE ) AS UPDDT, CAST(A.DELDT as DATE ) AS DELDT, A.REGMEMID, A.UPDMEMID, A.DELMEMID, A.DELYN, A.BC_FILETYPEDESC, B.MENU_CODE, B.MENU_NAME, B.MENU_SITECODE FROM T_BOARD_CONFIG A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_MENU B ON A.BC_ID = B.MENU_SUBTYPE WHERE 1=1 AND A.DELYN = 'N' AND A.BC_LIST = '100' AND B.DELYN = 'N'

/* mngrGetBoardConfigByMenuCode */ SELECT bc_id, bc_name, bc_skin, bc_type, bc_topinfo, bc_viewcount, bc_list, bc_view, bc_regist, bc_update, bc_reply, bc_mngr_list, bc_mngr_view, bc_mngr_regist, bc_mngr_update, bc_mngr_reply, bc_replyyn, bc_fileyn, bc_secretyn, bc_noticeyn, bc_groupyn, bc_groupcode, bc_filecount, bc_filesize, bc_defaultpage, bc_editoryn, bc_prevnextyn, bc_koglyn, bc_thumbyn, bc_thumbcount, bc_thumbwidth, bc_thumbheight, bc_thumbratioyn, bc_extcolumninfo, regdt, upddt, deldt, regmemid, updmemid, delmemid, delyn, bc_RSS, bc_comment FROM t_board_config WHERE bc_id=(SELECT menu_subtype FROM t_menu WHERE menu_code=#{menuCode})
